alert.note: Alert for Choctaw; Clay; Oktibbeha (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 09 at 7:57PM CST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT NORTHEASTERN CHOCTAW...NORTHERN OKTIBBEHA AND SOUTHWESTERN CLAY COUNTIES THROUGH 830 PM CST... At 757 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Sherwood, or 12 miles northeast of Ackerman, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Starkville, Maben, and Pheba around 800 PM CST. Griffith around 810 PM CST. Muldrow around 815 PM CST. Pala Alto around 820 PM CST. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until midnight CST for central, north central and northeastern Mississippi.
